articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Weightlifting Game
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Weightlifting Game
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un, together with Ri Sol Ju, Sunday watched senior women's 63 kg and 69 kg categories of the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship.
					 Kim Jong Un met with the vice-chairman of the International Weightlifting Federation (IWD) who is also first vice-chairman of the Asian Weightlifting Federation (AWF), the general secretary of the AWF and the vice-chairman of the AWF in the venue of the weightlifting event.
					
					 They thanked him for making sure that necessary steps were taken so that the championship could be held successfully.
					
					 They said that his presence was great support and encouragement to the AWF and great honor and happiness for them as well.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that he was very pleased to see weightlifters from different countries playing in Pyongyang with sports enthusiasm sweeping across the DPRK and public interest in sports steadily increasing in the country. He appreciated the big efforts made by AWF, IWF and other related bodies for the successful opening of the championship.
					
					 DPRK women Ri Jong Hwa, Ryo Un Hui and Jo Pok Hyang won gold medals.
					
					 Chinese weightlifter Long Dingling also bagged a gold medal.
					
					 He clapped them in congratulation of their success.
					
					 He expressed the conviction that the championship drawing men and women players from over 10 countries and regions would serve as an important occasion in boosting exchange and cooperation among sportspersons and further developing the weightlifting techniques.
					
					 Among the spectators were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Yong Su and other senior party, state and army officials, as well as Pyongyang citizens.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from AWF General Secretary
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from AWF General Secretary 
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Ali Moradi, general secretary of the Asian Weightlifting Federation (AWF), who is taking part in the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship. 
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by Ali Moradi on Sunday.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Foreigners visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday to pay tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. They included a delegation of the Batida Theatre of Denmark led by General Director Soren Valent Ovesen.
					 They paid tribute to the Generalissimos before their statues. 
					
					 They entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches they used during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives. 
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Culprit of Cyber Attack
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Culprit of Cyber Attack 
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is the chief culprit of cyber attack, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Some time ago, a foreign news service disclosed that intelligence organs of the U.S. mounted cyber attacks on different countries. The report grounded on new materials made public by Snowden, former CIA contractor, made a big splash in the world media. 
					
					 The U.S. conducted 231 cyber attacks on other countries in 2011 alone. 
					
					 Washington seeks to realize its ambition for supremacy by using another aggression means, cyber attack. Its insanity has now reached the zenith. 
					
					 According to official data available, the U.S. intelligence service has spent 652 million dollars to spread vicious codes to news and computer networks of different countries, and hacked into their computer networks. The number of the vicious codes transferred to other countries by the U.S. is estimated to stand at 85 000 at the end of this year. 
					
					 The U.S. is mulling development of a code capable of clipping specified paragraph from telephone conversations under its watch within this year. 
					
					 In recent years the U.S. established a cyber command and consented to developing cyber attack weapon and allocated funds for it. Now it is ready to use cyber attack weapon in the actual war. 
					
					 It is the core of the U.S. foreign military policy to grasp the Asia-Pacific region by force. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. listed the DPRK as target of cyber attack and launched high-level attack on it. The U.S. commits criminal acts overtly and covertly to isolate and stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 It is a foolish daydream, however, for the U.S. to try to bring down the DPRK with cyber attack.

articles.title: Reunification Represents Patriotism: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Reunification Represents Patriotism: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Reunification is patriotism and national prosperity while division is treachery and national misfortune.
					 Whether one stands for reunification or division serves as a touchstone distinguishing patriotism from treachery.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article on Sunday. It goes on:
					
					 Patriotism generates prosperity but treachery will cause the national ruin.
					
					 The reunification of Korea will help the nation regain its original nature as a homogeneous nation and mobilize and tap the resources of the whole land of Korea and the wisdom and talents of all compatriots for the prosperity of the country and nation in a unified way, thereby opening up the broad way for building prosperous Korea. The division of Korea, on the contrary, will bisect the land of the country for an indefinite period, harm the homogeneity of the nation and disturb the unified development of the Korean nation.
					
					 The division prevents the Korean nation from using its potential power for the prosperity of the country and nation. What is more intolerable is that the human and material resources have been misused for inciting national confrontation and making preparations for a war against the DPRK due to the U.S. moves to keep its military bases in south Korea.
					
					 The national reunification will make substantial contribution to ensuring the lasting peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula. The division, on the contrary, is a major factor escalating the confrontation and tension on the peninsula.
					
					 The genuine peace on the Korean Peninsula can be achieved only when all the Koreans develop the north-south relations based on the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and achieve the reconciliation, unity and reunification of the nation.
					
					 It is a mockery and deception to pay lip-service to "peace" while pursuing the confrontation and division. Division will not bring peace but lead to confrontation and war.
					
					 As the national reunification is in the interests common to the nation, all the compatriots in the north, south and abroad should turn out as one in the just and patriotic actions to promote the reconciliation, unity, reunification and prosperity of the nation with patriotism.

articles.title: Disbandment of IS Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Disbandment of IS Demanded in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Gathering of Elders of the Action for Civilians' Sovereignty of south Korea released a statement "Disband at once Intelligence Service, engineer of plotting rebellion" on Wednesday. 
					 The statement recalled that the Intelligence Service (IS) on August 28 forcibly searched the houses and offices of a lawmaker from the opposition Unified Progressive Party and others concerned and arrested three of them, charging them with plotting rebellion. 
					
					 The evidence of the rebellion presented by the IS is totally groundless, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Those who were charged with alleged spying and plotted rebellion in the past, cases made up by the dictatorial power, are being proved not guilty one by one. 
					
					 The IS's intention is to turn in its favor the unfavorable situation in which it is tight-cornered in face of public anger for its illegal interference in the election.
					
					 The IS's sinister intention is to chill the atmosphere of south-north dialogue, plunge the inter-Korean ties into deadlock and prolong the days of the conservative ruling quarters. 
					
					 Now people of all social standings have launched vigorous actions including the release of declarations and sit-in strikes in demand of the withdrawal of the evil law, stop to plots and settlement of the IS case. 
					
					 All the political parties, social organizations and people should wage unflinching actions against the IS and the conservative ruling forces.

articles.title: S. Korean DM's Anti-DPRK Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean DM's Anti-DPRK Remarks under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Kwan Jin, defence minister of south Korea, at a recent "meeting of army commanding officers" made a far-fetched assertion that "the north made a provocation during days of the south-north dialogue in the past".
					 He called for tightening the military discipline in the run-up to Chusok (Harvest Moon Day) and maintaining a high-alert posture as usual.
					
					 A commentary on Minju Joson Sunday terms his remarks coarse invectives deliberately irritating and insulting the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin seems enjoying himself in deteriorating the north-south relations, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 At the 2nd ASEAN Defense Ministers' Meeting-Plus some days ago he screamed out hoarse "nuclear and missile threats from the north".
					
					 In the light of his remarks no one can vouch that he will not make up a shocking incident. If so, it is likely that it will chill the atmosphere of north-south dialogue and detente that was provided on the north's positive initiative and by its sincere efforts and plunge the inter-Korean ties into collapse as were done under the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 The warmongers like Kim Kwan Jin should be kept from behaving arbitrarily. Only then will it be possible to deter in time grave situation, improve the inter-Korean ties and achieve independent reunification and peace and prosperity of the country.
					
					 They are seriously miscalculated if they think they can find a way-out in hampering the improvement of the north-south relations and in escalating the tension.

articles.title: Truth behind Spying Case in Days of Military Dictatorship Revealed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Truth behind Spying Case in Days of Military Dictatorship Revealed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- South Korean Yonhap News reported that plots hatched by the past military dictatorial regime in south Korea are being revealed in succession.
					 A Japan-residing Korean studying in south Korea, who had served a prison term for seven years since 1984 on a false charge of spying, was recently found innocent.
					
					 The investigators of the Defense Security Command of the puppet army threw the student studying at the Medical College of the Korea University into prison in August, 1984.
					
					 The investigators extorted a "confession" that he came to south Korea from Japan on a spy mission at the "instructions" of the north.
					
					 They threatened him with torture if he pleaded not guilty at the trial.
					
					 As a result he was sentenced to 7 years imprisonment on charges of violation of the "National Security Law". 
					
					 The military dictatorial regime abducted and harshly tortured innocent people and wrested false confession from them, cooking up lots of spying cases.
					
					 In this regard the court concluded that the victims and their families should be compensated for their freedom and human rights being abused by the authorities.

articles.title: End to Discrimination against Part-timers Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
End to Discrimination against Part-timers Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Solidarity Meeting of the Public Sector Part-time Jobs held a press conference in Kwanghwamun plaza, Seoul on Thursday demanding the puppet authorities opt for solving the issue of part-time job.
					 At the conference speakers disclosed that some time ago the government suggested a measure related with the part-time job which made no mention of a realistic way of solving the issue.
					
					 They condemned the present chief executive for not following through on her election commitment to turn the part-time jobs in the public sector into full-time jobs.
					
					 They accused her of not responding to the demands raised by the workers to size up the situation of part-time jobs and press for a correct measure.
					
					 They vented their rage, shouting that now the part-time workers of public sector are subject to serious discrimination and exploitation for the single reason that they are part-time jobbers.
					
					 They pledged to turn out in actions against the authorities keen to produce more part-time jobs and push the workers to death.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published by Italian Magazine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published by Italian Magazine
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" was carried by an Italian internet magazine on September 7.
					 The work published on December 25, Juche 84 (1995) deals with the idea that respecting the forerunners of the revolution is the requirement of the revolution and indicates the principal issues arising in establishing the moral traits of respecting them and encouraging the people to cherish noble moral obligation.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Switzerland
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A seminar on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was held by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on September 7.
					 Martin Lotscher, chief of the above-said group, in his report stressed that the work serves as important guidelines indicating the way for most successfully carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 It is the firm will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and people of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un to carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche, upholding the banner of Songun.
					
					 We firmly believe that the army and people of the DPRK will dynamically advance along the road of Songun, independence and socialism and register brilliant successes in their efforts to build an economic power and improve the people's living standard in the "speed on Masik Pass".
					
					 We will more positively conduct the work to study and disseminate the Juche idea and Songun idea and solidarity activities to support the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The speakers praised exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in developing the army into an invincible revolutionary army and leading the revolution and construction with the might of Songun for over half a century since his start of Songun revolutionary leadership.  
					
					 They expressed support for the DPRK's cause of Songun.

articles.title: Nation-building Exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Nation-building Exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the nation-building exploits by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il took place in Russia, Mexico and Indonesia from Aug. 31 to Sept. 2 to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 The chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia in her report praised the nation-building exploits and Songun revolutionary exploits by Kim Il Sung, who founded the DPRK, genuine country for the people, and Kim Jong Il, who turned it into an invincible socialist power. 
					
					 The DPRK is rapidly developing under the supreme leader Kim Jong Un, she said, adding that now the Korean people have achieved big labor successes in the important fields for economic construction on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the country.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers said over the past 65 years the DPRK has turned into a socialist power with strong sense of independence and self-sustenance by fully applying the immortal Juche idea to all fabrics of social life and a genuine country for the people where public welfare is ensured at the highest level. They praised the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in building a socialist state. 
					
					 Referring to the fact that the might of the DPRK is becoming stronger as the days go by under the wise Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, they expressed full support and solidarity for the just cause of the Korean people to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Russia.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in Vietnam, Mexico, Brazil and Bangladesh in the period from Sept. 3 to 6 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in nation-building and Songun revolution and photos dealing with the revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Displayed there were works of the great men and books and photos introducing the successes made by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Present there were figures of various circles and masses in relevant countries.
					
					 Pham Tat Dong, chairman of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, said that the founding of the DPRK was a brilliant fruition of the arduous and heroic struggle waged by the Korean people under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and an event of great significance that ushered in the new phase in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, noted that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a socialist power that has thoroughly applied independence in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliance in national defense.
					
					 Speakers including Nelson Chaves dos Santos, secretary of the International Relations of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, and Ricardo Alemao Abreu, international secretary of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, praised exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in nation-building and Songun leadership and the invincibility of socialism in the DPRK.
					
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, and others said that the Korean people would certainly build a thriving socialist nation, smashing all moves of the imperialists, adding the DPRK is displaying its dignity and might as a political, ideological and military power.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Guinea, Indonesia
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Guinea, Indonesia
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Seminar and visit to a Kimilsungia greenhouse took place in Guinea and visit to a Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouse in Indonesia on September 1 and 2 to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 On display in their venues were photos documenting the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Visitors were mesmerized by the beauty of the famous flowers.
					
					 The chairman and the vice-chairman of the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association referred to the nation-building exploits the President performed by founding the DPRK and strengthening it, explaining how the flower praising the sun came into being in the world and mentioning the deep reverence of the world progressives for the President, a peerlessly great man.
					
					 A member of the Council for Jakarta Orchid Park of Indonesia said Kimilsungia is widely known to the peoples of the two countries as a symbol of Indonesia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 Deeming it great honor to have a greenhouse named after President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Indonesia, the member vowed to bring the famous flowers into full bloom in the future, too.

articles.title: Just Cause of Koreans Supported by British Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Just Cause of Koreans Supported by British Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, released a statement on Sept. 6 to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Noting the founding of the DPRK on September 9, 1948 made it possible for the Korean people who were liberated from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule to more dynamically wage the struggle to create a new life, exercising their democratic right, the general secretary noted:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung built Korean-style socialism based on the Juche idea.
					
					 After his demise in 1994 Comrade Kim Jong Il devoted his whole life to the people, holding aloft the banner of Songun.
					
					 He was an outstanding thinker and theoretician and a prominent statesman who always led the Workers' Party of Korea to victory, true to the cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He firmly defended Korean socialism from the threat and provocation by the U.S. imperialists and its lackeys and worked heart and soul for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for building a thriving nation has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The New Communist Party of Britain is convinced that the Korean people would overcome all the trials and accomplish their cause.
					
					 We praise the spirit and will of the Korean people to defend socialism and firmly believe that they will make strenuous efforts to protect their social system in the 21st century, too.

articles.title: Vietnamese Paper Introduces DPRK
articles.content:
Vietnamese Paper Introduces DPRK 
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Vietnamese newspaper Quan Doi Nhan Dan on Sept. 9 carried an article "'Speed on Masik Pass', on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK". 
					 It said Masik Pass is a right place for ski resort for its beautiful scenery and snow that covers the pass from November to March of the following year, adding:
					
					 The ski resort on Masik Pass rises more than 1 360 meters above the sea and its air has rich oxygen contents. 
					
					 The Pyongyang-Wonsan tourist highway nearby offers good traffic conditions for the visitors. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un initiated the construction of the ski resort. 
					
					 The paper introduced in detail soldier-builders fully displaying the strong disposition of the revolutionary army in the construction of the projects including ski courses, public service facilities and ropeway. 
					
					 Now the dynamic campaign of creating "speed on Masik Pass" is under way in the DPRK.
					
					 Service personnel and shock brigade members who turned out in reclaiming the Sepho Tableland are bringing about innovations on a daily basis in the creation of meadow and construction of stockbreeding base. 
					
					 A high-pitched drive for increased production is at full swing in the four pilot sectors of the national economy and in the fields of basic industry, agriculture and light industry in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre reconstruido Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre reconstruido Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea recorrio el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang reconstruido conforme a la demanda de la epoca actual por la potencia de deportes.
					Al recorrer durante largo tiempo varios lugares del palacio se entero en detalles del estado de reconstruccion y el arreglo.
					
					En la sala de presentacion del historial escucho con atencion la explicacion sobre el historial del palacio donde estan impregnadas las huellas de direccion sobre terreno del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En el hall del gimnasio dijo con satisfaccion que una vez instalada en el techo del hall la tabla metalica adornada es tan claro el interior del gimnasio y es agradable verlo
					
					Al enterarse de flexibilidad de suelo del gimnasio y el eco acustico en el espacio lo califico de talla mundial y agrego que alli se pueden realizar tambien cualesquier competencias internacionales.
					
					Enseno en la necesidad de alfombrar el suelo del gimnasio al organizar los actos y otras actividades, asi que se debe utilizar el palacio para fines multilaterales.
					
					Subrayo que resalta mas el aspecto del palacio una vez instalados nuevamente en la parte trasera de la tribuna mas de 3 mil asientos para ver las competencias y realizar los actos y pintadas las paredes de la tribuna y los asientos  con polvos de piedra.
					
					Al informarse de que se establecio el sistema de doble luminosidad en el palacio para garantizar tanto los juegos como los actos, se entero del estado de iluminacion.
					
					Se cercioro del estado de la obra de halles y pasillos subiendo del primero al cuatro piso.
					
					Al ver los datos exitosos de los deportistas por disciplinas exhibidos en halles de cada piso dijo que los deportistas y los visitantes gustarian al verlo.
					
					Paso revista a los dormitorios de jugadores, salas de entrenadores, las de entrenamientos y comedores acondicionadas en varios pisos.
					
					En la sala de entrenamiento cuyo suelo esta cubierto por el material de buena calidad, al ver la pared repellada con adornos evaluo que se ideo bien.
					
					Destaco que es bueno haber instalado en las salas de entrenamiento los aireacondicionados y ventiladores para que hicieran realizar los ejercicios en todas las estaciones.
					
					Senalo que se pondran en las salas de entrenamiento los TV y los aparatos de videos para que los jugadores vean las competencias nacionales e internacionales y el aspecto de sus entrenamientos.
					
					Dijo que recorrio con satisfaccion el palacio y evaluo que los funcionarios y los trabajadores de la Direccion de Construccion en el Extranjero participantes en la obra hayan cumplido  magnificamente las tareas dadas por el partido.
					
					Senalo que el palacio con historia se ha reconstruido magnificamente conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo en el tiempo en que se abre la nueva era dorada de la construccion y expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que los funcionarios y los empleados del palacio transmiten las inmortales hazanas de la direccion de los Generalisimos haciendo bien el mantenimiento y la operacion normal. 
					
					Le acompanaron Jang Song Thaek, Ri Jae Il y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre cine de ritmo tridimensional y salas de juegos electronicos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre cine de ritmo tridimensional y salas de juegos electronicos
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea recorrio el cine de ritmo tridimensional y las salas de juegos electronicos construidos nuevamente en el parque de atracciones de Area de Recreo del Pueblo de Rungna.
					Primero, recorrio el cine de ritmo tridimensional de Rungna.
					
					Recorriendo varios lugares del cine se entero en detalles del estado de construccion, el caracter de los equipos y el plan de operacion del cine.
					
					Pasando por la sala de espectaculo, la de control y la de redaccion se mostro muy satisfecho de que los constructores militares hayan construido magnificamente en un corto tiempo el moderno cine de ritmo tridimensional.
					
					En la sala de espectaculo no.5 vio las peliculas tridimensionales "Vencedores" y "!No nos esperen!" y se cercioro minuciosamente de la calidad, la eficacia de sonido y el estado de ritmo de videos.
					
					Evaluo que los funcionarios y los tecnicos de la Compania de Video Mokran hayan elaborado con la creativa inteligencia y entusiasmo las peliculas de ritmo tridimensional de alta tecnologia sofisticada.
					
					Dijo que es importante unirse bien el ritmo con la pelicula para que los jovenes, ninos y trabajadores sientan en el mundo virtual el interes como si fuera la realidad.
					
					Destaco que se debe normalizar la operacion de cine haciendo bien la organizacion de espectaculo y el mantenimiento de los equipos porque en el futuro vendrian muchas personas.
					
					Subrayo que se deben construir tales cines  tanto en la ciudad de Pyongyang como en todas las capitales provinciales.
					
					Enseno que con la construccion de este cine se oiran mas en esta aerea de recreo las risas de los habitantes.
					
					El Mariscal paso por nuevas salas de juegos electronicos.
					
					Al recorrerlas se mostro muy satisfecho de que bajo el beneficio del partido los habitantes pueden disfrutar de varios juegos.
					
					El centro de juegos electronicos es el regalo del partido para los habitantes, senalo y destaco que se deben elevar la responsabilidad y el papel de los servidores y hacer bien el mantenimiento de los equipos para normalizar la operacion y brindar comodidades a los jovenes, ninos y trabajadores.
					
					Se hizo conocimiento del estado de la funcion y las actividades de servicio de las instalaciones de recreo del parque de atracciones.
					
					El mismo dia, el se entero detalladamente de la escena de funcion al aire libre construida nuevamente en la Area de Recreo del Pueblo de Rungna.
					
					Enfatizo que los funcionarios y los servidores de area de recreo deben hacer bien la administracion y normalizar la operacion con el espiritu de servicio abnegado al pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron Jang Song Thaek, Ri Jae Il, Pak Chun Hong y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Resultados de tercera jornada de campeonato de levantamiento de pesas
articles.content:
Resultados de tercera jornada de campeonato de levantamiento de pesas
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Los resultados de los juegos de la segunda jornada (dia 13) del campeonato de levantamiento de pesas por la copa asiatica y de clubes de los jovenes y adultos de 2013 son siguientes:
					
					Division de 85kg (m) de categoria juvenil por la copa asiatica:
						
					
					Envion
					
					1. Jo Myong Song (RPDC)           170 kg
						
					
					Division de 94kg (m) de categoria juvenil por la copa asiatica
						
					
					Arrenque 
					
					1.Denis Ulanov (Kazajstan)          147 kg
						
					
					Envion
